Name: Encore
Effect: Single Target. Reaction 3. The Target will repeat the exact same action sequence it had last Round. Target must have had an action sequence. Duration 1 Round. If used on the previous Round, this move fails. See more on p. 529.
Description: The Pok√©mon makes a standing ovation at their target, prompting them to repeat everything they just did, exactly the way they did it.
